page.title: 08ALLINGTON BAR FARM
page.content: {ALLINGTON BAR FARM}IS 2\ KM WEST OF CHIPPENHAM . THE FARMER IS{MR REYNOLDS , HE IS AN ARABLE FARMER , HE HAS 210 ACRES . HE GROWS WHEAT , BARLEY , PEAS , RAPE , AND POTATES , HE ALSO HAS 2 PIGS , 2 SOWS AND ABOUT 42 BEEF CATTLE . HE SENDS THEM TO{CHIPPENHAM MARKET . THE PRICE OF A BACON PIG IS Â£70 , PORK Â£50 AND SOW Â£100 . HE SOMETIMES SENDS THEM STRAIGHT TO THE{SLAUGHTER HOUSE . HE DOES ALL THIS IN 14 HOURS WITH 2 FARM HANDS , HE HAS BEEN DOING THIS FOR 25 YRS . THE FARM GOT ITS NAME FROM A TOLL IN THE ROAD NEXT TO ALLINGTON BAR , THEY USED TO HAVE TO STOP PAY{A TOLL}AT IT . MR REYNOLDS SAYS THAT FARMING IS A NICE WAY OF LIFE BUT IT IS HARD .
